title: S17 Ep28: TCT: Ruse: From Hollywood to Wall Street w/ Robert Kerbeck

description:
True Crime Tuesday presents: Ruse: From Hollywood to Wall Street with author, Robert Kerbeck!Â 

In the world of high finance, multibillion dollar Wall Street banks greedily guard their secrets, Robert Kerbeck was a working actor who made his real money lying on the phone, charming people, into revealing their employers' most valuable information!

Get the book, Ruse: Lying the American Dream from Hollywood to Wall Street here: https://amzn.to/3J7Ilkx
